page.title: 02MY FIRST DAY IN SETTLE
page.content: When I heard I was to come to England I was excited. I could not keep still. Before I came to England I lived in Germany. When we arrived in Hellifield I was very excited because I had not seen my cousin for four years. And you can imagine how excited I was. When I visited Settle Middle School on a Monday morning I was nervous.When I started school the class were going to Malham. Living here is quite nice except for times when I fall out with Abigail. There are a few places I have not yet explored. When I get home from school I walk up and down Haw Hill which keeps me fit. But when I get up at 7.00am I want to stay in bed. {Marian Hodgeson 11yrs
